title: Blue Light Filter - Night Mode, Night Shift
description:
Eyes feel tired during night reading on the phone?  

Have trouble in sleeping after long time watching phone screen?

That is due to blue light. Blue light from your phone and tablet screen is the visible light spectrum (380-550nm) for circadian regulation. According to the scientific studies, exposure to blue light imposes serious threats to retinal neurons and inhibits the secretion of melatonin, a hormone that influences circadian rhythms. It is proven that reducing blue light can greatly improve sleep.

Blue light filter is used to reduce blue light by adjusting the screen to natural color. Shifting your screen to night mode can relieve your eyes strain, and your eyes will feel at ease during night reading. Also blue light filter will protect your eyes and help you sleep easily.

Features:
‚óè Reduce blue light 
‚óè Adjustable filter intensity
‚óè Save power
‚óè Very easy to use
‚óè Built-in screen dimmer
‚óè Eye protector from screen light

Reduce Blue Light
The screen filter can change your screen into natural color, so it can reduce the blue light which will affect your sleep. 

Screen Filter Intensity
By sliding the button, you can easily adjust the filter intensity to soften the screen light . 

Save Power
Practice shows it can greatly save power because of reducing screen blue light. 

Easy to Use
Handy buttons and auto timer will help you turn on and turn off the app in one second. Very useful app for eye care.

Screen Dimmer
You can adjust your screen brightness accordingly. Get better reading experience.

Eye Protector From Screen Light
Screen shift to night mode to protect your eyes and relieve your eyes in no time. 

Tips:
‚óè Before installing other app, please turn off or pause this app to enable installation.
‚óè When taking screenshots, please turn off or pause this app in case screenshots use the app effect.

Relevant Scientific Studies 

Effects of blue lights technology
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Effects_of_blue_lights_technology

High Sensitivity of the Human Circadian Melatonin Rhythm to Resetting by Short Wavelength Light

AMBER LENSES TO BLOCK BLUE LIGHT AND IMPROVE SLEEP: A RANDOMIZED TRIAL

Anti Glare Screen Filter
Still looking for anti glare screen filter? This is an useful anti glare screen filter you need to try. Care your eyes with our anti glare screen filter.

comments: Used to be fantastic. Now it has annoying ads that play before you can enable it. I'd be less annoyed if the ads played right after enabling it so I didn't have a bright video flash into my eyes unexpectedly. Got this to help with my migraines and now it tends to trigger them. Ads are fine - ya gotta make money. Do it smart though. If you're trying to get people to use your app because it helps reduce eye strain, forcing them to watch videos that strain your eyes isn't the smartest way to go.

I've enjoyed this app for over a year, it's very comforting on the eyes and I like that there are multiple different screen filter options to chose from depending on what you want and each one can be set to your preferred dimness/brightness. I notice when I don't use it now, I get irritated looking at a screen without it. It looks funny at first, I first started by using at night because I wasn't used to it, but now I can't stand not having it on full time. It feels normal after a day or two.

It works like it's supposed to :) . Sometimes when I have it on and I turn off my phone, the filter stops working even though it says it's still on. Nothing a "quick click to stop and turn it on again" can't fix. üòÅ Thankyou for this app! I just love how easy it is to use and how I can adjust the brightness etc.!

Blue Light Filter is a perfect app I use every day to protect my eyes as there are many settings from which to choose, depending on the amount of light present and the amount of light one feels is necessary in order to comfortably view the screen, as a result. Other blue light shielding apps are not as easy or pleasant to use, and usually have a foolishly ovrrcomplicated UI. I've tried many other such apps, but have never found one to be nearly as useful and relatively bug-free.

It does work really well, however if I'm still using my phone after a few mins it just turns off the blue light. I have to open the app for it to work again which is a bit tedious... I also can't select it in that multiple page thingy on my phone. It doesnt exist. Going to look at using a different app now since it doesn't seem to work well for me. I have the honor play phone, in case u want to fix it.

title: Blue Light Filter & Night Mode - Night Shift

It's part of a natural light spectrum, which disturbs the circadian rhythm and causes sleeplessness, headache and bad eye health. Unlike red light night shade, screen light bluelight blocks the secretion of melatonin, sleep hormone, and causes restlessness. Retinal neurons are in danger if night filter anti glare is not used after twilight for eye care.

Night Shift - Blue Light Filter for Migraine includes:

comments: Much better than the blue light filters that come on my Android. I can make the screen so dark I can barely see it in a pitch black room. I don't put it quite that dark, but it shows the capability of this app. Update March 14th 2020. Something changed with the app. It's harder to pause or turn on the dark screen from your Android drop-down menu. You have to stop what you're doing and open the app to pause it or turn it on. I don't know why they changed this, it was perfect before. Frustrating

Does not play well with other apps or Google. Closes other apps and Google frequently. Its only started happening since I installed this app. The app works great and I love the filter intensity and ease of use but it upsets my phone in too many ways and so i am not going to spend money on the full version until it is more stable on Android. Sorry developers. Please look into this issue we can enjoy your work and keep our eyes healthy. Ta!

Classic app, really helpful to the eye. However, is there a way you can allow this app to run in the lock screen as it disables after you lock or open. Also is there a chance to make the app dim the notification/bar. Very good with black theme but can be uneasy with white colour schemes. Either way this app would be a 5 star if the notification and the lock screen has dim effect. Edit #1: Yes I have updated this app and I'm pleased to say that you guys fixed the problem as I've said. Thanks

Unfortunately I have to give this a 2 for now. The reason is because if does t stay on despite the schedule time frame to be active. I've given it permission to override all other apps. I've been through all the settings to make sure I didn't miss something. But still it turns itself off. And even stranger, sometimes it turns itself back on after a few minutes. Whatever this glitch is needs to be fixed.

Maybe someone can help with a problem I got. I tried the app, and then wanted to delete it, but after deleting the screen stayed yellow tainted. So at the moment I don't have the app but the screen is still yellow... Tried different phone settings, the issue prevails. Has anyone experienced it? On the other hand it does its job.. Maybe too well.

comments: This app is very helpful in dimming my phone's screen past the normal darkest setting. It greatly reduces the brightness that bothers my eyes when I'm reading in bed at night, and also helps to not disturb my light sensitive husband when he is trying to sleep. I use it every single night with no issues, super useful app, keep up the good work!

Norton doesn't trust it. Why would an app like this need to collect information if you've never had to input any information? Screen logger? My wells fargo account got hit for like $25 the other day while I was asleep. This was the only suspicious app that norton alerted me of. Idk who hacked my account but don't trust these apps yall.

Does the job very well and never glitches or interferes, something very rare in this kind of utility app. I paid not because it's obtrusive in any way, but because I'm so pleased with how well it works that I wanted to reward the developer for doing such a good job!
At first, I couldn't believe that there is any app that can still lower the least brightness of a phone.ü§≠ It make my sight cool and normal than the lowest brightness of the phone...

Its a super annoying app to use, sure it does ita job most of the time but recently its been turns itself off every 5 seconds and gotta open the app again to turn it back on, and ive experienced this issue with more than one phone. Frankly, if this issue is fixed it would be a way better app.

title: Night of the Full Moon
description:
"Night of the Full Moon" is a stand-alone card game. There is no mandatory beginners guide, no internet connection, no brush map, no ten strokes. The plot will be played in the card battle. Each NPC and BOSS are given a mission and a temperament. Different choices will bring different endings.

[Drama]
In order to find the missing grandmother, Little Red Riding Hood went alone to the Black Forest, where it was always dark and night. She is about to face the guardian of the forest elves, the ferocious werewolf, the sedentary witch, the strange villagers and the truth that slowly surfaced...
On the full moon night, the mysterious veil of the Black Forest will be unveiled one by one...

[Features]
* Mild strategy turn-based card battle
* Five occupations, more than 400 cards free to match
* Ninety-two mysterious opponents await your challenge
* Randomly trigger unknown events during the adventure
* Multiple plot options that affect your reputation and courage

[Developer's message]
Willing to adulthood we still remember the beginning of the heart, like Little Red Riding Hood as brave and warm
No matter how dark the way forward, never give up my heart so that you can finally pursue the light.
On the full moon night, reunite with your grandmother.
For the candlelight of the years, for a good ending

„ÄêContact us„Äë
Follow us for Walk-through Query and Customer Support:
FaceBook: https://www.facebook.com/NightofFullMoonCardGame/
Discord:     https://discord.gg/eEH9SS2

recentChanges:
1. Optimized the problem of some equipments stuck.
2. Fixed the issue that Blessing Black Swan and Blessing Death only trigger once when both exist.
3. Optimized the problem of insensitivity to the selection button of Little Ranger in Red Hood diary mode.
4. Optimized the order of fixed blessings when using Card Sew up or Card Stealing Power.
comments: Simply Amazing, it gives sufficient amount of gameplay for a free game. With expansion pack available for money, which makes sense as there aren't any forced ads. The story is beautiful and the types of cards are in hundreds. I never use money for a mobile game but this game makes me think otherwise though the expansion pack is a little expensive ( rightly so)

One of my favorite mobile games ever. It's one of the few I find myself able to play for hours at a time or in short sessions. So fun. Great mechanics, visuals, story, sound. Just so well put together. I definitely got my money's worth out of the extra in app purchases. Dont let them scare you off. The basics are great too!

Its so refreshing to see a well made game that focuses on being a good game instead of milking the player of money. The roguelike card-system is well made and if there is criticiam to be had, its that the game is not that long and needs a bit more bosses and other content. That being said its not light obn content by any means and well worth the price.

Good game. Get on their FB page Some cards have grammar errors making them unclear. Only 3 chapters r free. I bought the other characters, and they are good. Read all cards& enemy effects when playing. You can be 2hurt to proceed w/only fights left; fix that! I cant get past cursed werewolf. The Blessing to copy cards is broken, it never worked--please fix it. Modest chest doesn't mean what devs think it does.

A brilliant, well-thought, and organized masterpiece! Most fun and addicting game I've played in a while. I see it as a mix of board game and card game in which you can see the effects. If ever you're tired playing the usual mmo, gacha, and cash grab mobages. This is definitely a must try.

title: Night Owl - Screen Dimmer & Night Mode
description:
Do your eyes feel tired while you're reading at night on the phone? Are you having trouble falling asleep after a long time looking at your phone screen? Night Owl may be the solution for you!

With Night Owl you can reduce the brightness of your screen lower than you can achieve with the default settings in order to avoid eye strain or headaches in a dark environment or at night. You can also filter out blue light which causes eye strain, inability to sleep and headaches. 

Features
‚Ä¢ Display backlight dimming
‚Ä¢ Blue light filter
‚Ä¢ Advanced color filter
‚Ä¢ Auto start and stop timer

Premium features
‚Ä¢ Ad free
‚Ä¢ Sun timer

Permission details
‚Ä¢ Display over other apps Used for putting a filter on your device screen.
‚Ä¢ Modify system settings. Used for setting the system brightness to minimum.
‚Ä¢ Access Location. Used for determining your location for sunrise and sunset time.
‚Ä¢ View network connections and full network access. Used for serving ads and loading the location map.

comments: I think the app is perfect at what it does, and I have no issues getting it to work. There's a lot of settings to choose from, like warm and cool filters to scheduling specific times for it. One thing however, and I know this is different for other devices, but because my device (Galaxy s9) is only allowed to have the screen dimmed and not the status bar or the notification panel, is there any word on making the notification dark/black? It would really help for devices such as mine

perfect app. I downloaded a few to compare. This one was the best. I can't stand the bright blue light. This app allows me to pick the tone and the brightness. I personally like my brightness down super. It has the ability to get so dark, don't forget to turn the app off before walking outside in the sun! I learned that the hard way as I tapped around on my screen trying to find the pp and the stop button!

Best I've found, and I've tried a LOT! It isn't intrusive, it's easy to turn off and on, there are no ads, it doesn't randomly turn itself off and blind you in the middle of the night, it doesn't constantly ask you to rate it, and it has a lot of flexible features. It makes me want to upgrade just to pay them for the great service I've got out of the free version.

I just updated it yesterday.. now my widget for it doesn't work!!! Fix this!!!!...... Ok, I just re-downloaded it after a week & got the widgets to work! I guess maybe the update didn't update the old widget I had on my screen! This is my one & only dimmer I like.. I tried with others nope! I love the widget option because I don't have to go into the app itself to turn it on/off/greater/less... Which makes it really easy to work with! üòâü¶âüí°üî¶

From simple to more advanced, this app has the settings to dim your screen. And colour adjustment, too. Auto start and stop included in the free version! And there's a widget available for the quick settings! Perhaps I just couldn't find it but for the auto stop in the manual timer, it would be nice for it to slowly brighten over 10 seconds (user defined please) rather than suddenly.

title: Night Mode
description:
Night Mode's main goal is to reduce the brightness of your screen lower than you can achieve with the default settings.

This application applies an overlay filter that acts as a dimmer to darken the screen and ensure your eyes don't hurt. üòé


‚ñ∂ Use Cases ‚óÄ
 - Prevent your eyes from hurting when the screen is too bright
 - Low light (In bed, theatre, cinema, ..) usage for reading, browsing, texting or gaming
 - Disable hardware or soft buttons backlight
 - If you have an AMOLED display, you can also save battery!


‚ñ∂ Permissions ‚óÄ
 - SYSTEM_ALERT_WINDOW: To show the dimmer overlay
 - INTERNET and ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE: To send anonymous statistics and bug reports (you can disable them completely in the settings) and to show the ad (yeah, just one :-)


Send me an Email if you have any problem, questions or suggestions!

title: Relax Night - Nature sounds: sleep & meditation
description:
Relax with the best sounds of the night. Fall asleep faster and sleep better!

Ideal for relaxing, sleeping, meditation, concentration, or if you have problems with tinnitus (ear ringing).

The app plays different sounds of the night, the sounds played in this way are also known as white noise.
White noise has beneficial effects on the body and mind because, covering the noise of the external environment, promotes relaxation and concentration.

You can set the timer and put your app in background or turn off the screen. At the end of the time, the sound fades gently and the application closes by itself. So you do not have to worry about closing the app if you fall asleep.

Do you have trouble going to sleep? This app helps you sleep by blocking distractions. Now you can asleep faster and sleep better!
You can say goodbye to your insomnia! Improve your life!

Use it after a stressful day to regain your inner peace. Go into your oasis of calm.


*** Application features ***

- 15+ perfectly looped sounds
- timer system that slowly fades audio out
- auto-pause sounds on incoming call
- volume controls
- quick menu
- usage in the background and with other apps
- no streaming is required for playback (no data connection required)
- pause and play sounds


*** List of sounds ***

- Brahms' Lullaby and crickets
- Frogs in the pond
- Peaceful night
- Night in the woods
- Rain and crickets
- Silent Night and crickets
- Boat in the lake
- Summer night
- Crickets around the lake
- Campfire on the beach
- Dawn in the field
- Night in tent
- Calm ocean at night
- Night in the field


*** Usage notes ***

For a better experience, I recommend you the use of headphones or earphones to listen the relaxing sounds.
You can use the app in background and with other apps.


*** Notes on permissions ***

- Device ID & call information (read phone status and identity)
Used to stop sound on incoming call and to play again at the end of call.

- In-app purchases
Used in the purchase of the premium version.

- Prevent phone from sleeping
Used to keep alive the app when you turn off the screen or while using other apps.

- Full network access and view network connections
Used to verify the purchases and show ads.

title: Best Night Light
description:
Best Night Light uses your phone's screen to illuminate a room using any of 3 different light modes - Night Light, Mood Light and Lava Lamp. Each mode is customisable and can be set on a timer up to 8 hours, or be left on all night with 'infinite' mode.

Best Night Light also now includes a selection of white noise or ambient background sounds.  These can be selected from any light mode, and play until the timer runs out or the light is cancelled.  The background sounds are ideal to help calm your mind and relax you before going to sleep.


Night Light

The Night light provides a soft and gentle light.  It‚Äôs bright enough to see by but is not bright enough to dazzle you or anyone else.

* Use it to read with before bed
* To get undressed without disturbing a sleeping partner
* Checking on or feeding your baby
* To chase away bad dreams and help adults and children alike to sleep better. 
And once the selected time has passed, it simply fades out and exits the app. 


Mood Light

The Mood light displays the colours of the rainbow, either randomly or in order. It can add ambience and atmosphere to a room.


Lava Lamp
Choose from a large selection of pre-set colour schemes, or create your own, then sit back, relax and watch as the screen swirls and whirls.

Notice:
If you are planning on using Best Night Light all night, then we recommend plugging in your device to ensure your battery does not go flat before you wake. For younger children and babies, please ensure that the device is left on a bedside table out of reach of the child.

If you want to stay up to date with news about updates to Best Night Light, as well as other exciting games and apps we‚Äôre developing then please either visit our website

https://www.warriorsofthecucumber.com

Or follow us on Facebook or Twitter

https://www.facebook.com/warriorsofthecucumber/
https://www.twitter.com/wotc_software

title: Night Owl Connect
description:
Night Owl Connect helps you keep an eye on your world, from anywhere in the world. Monitor your home or business, in real time, on your Smart Phone or Tablet. Easily share images and recordings via your favorite social network or through email and text. Be smart, be safe, be connected!

Night Owl Connect Features:

Quick and easy mobile setup
Live video and audio from your Cameras on Wi-Fi or 3G/4G LTE networks
Easily configure push notifications from your Smart Device
Save recordings directly to your Smart Device
Save images directly to your Smart Device and share via text, email or social media
Share important MP4 formatted videos via email or social media
Video playback
Multiple logins/users
Two-way audio
Google Integration (Limited devices)
Fish Eye Camera
Human Detection, Familiar Face, and Unfamiliar Face Alerts

Night Owl Security Products is a leading innovator in the security technology industry. As the fastest growing manufacturer of security DVRs, NVR‚Äôs, and Cameras, Night Owl offers the best value on the market. This is accomplished by designing and engineering products that are high quality, user friendly, and affordable. Our video surveillance equipment is used by homeowners, businesses, federal and municipal organizations, retailers, dealers, distributors and integrators across the globe.

Visit us at www.NightOwlSP.com for more information on all our products and services.

recentChanges: As our engineers prepare for the end of the decade, they felt obligated to squeeze in some updates and bug fixes for Night Owl Connect. The update includes a fix for compatibility issues some users experienced with Android OS v10. There were several other bugs that were fixed, but they are way too complicated to explain. Just know that Night Owl Connect is now better than ever!
comments: Update: My viewing issues don't involve wireless disconnect or interference. The app works for viewing every video recorded EXCEPT the most recent recording per camera. I have no idea why it won't play the most recent capture. But I have been able to verify this by attempting to play the video, failing, then walking in front of the camera to create a new video, then I can watch the previously unviewable video (although not being able to load/view/download the one I just made)

I mainly bought this because it has an app and I can check on things when I'm not home. But the app is horrible. I've been through all the troubleshooting, more than once and nothing. It freezes all the time, have to restart my phone several times just to get it work, I get a motion detection notification and it won't take me to it to show me. I paid a lot of money for this and I'm disabled and can't work, so this is a huge investment for me. I hope this gets fixed really soon.

At times it can be a pain. It keep losing connection with the wifi and I had to use so many email addresses until, I needed to make 2 new email addresses. I can not go back and look at any of the recordings. They need to improve on these problems. I want to add more, but the one I have, is a lot of work to keep it going. Then it freez up every now and again. But I do like it. I'll see if I can find something better, but if I can't, I will try these again. Improve your items.

If I could give negative stars I would. I cannot play back events via the app on either my Android or iPhone on good wifi networks. After 5 attempts to reach someone on live chat support I was told it would be escalated to level 2 support. Never heard from anyone. Contacted support again and told the same thing. No one ever contacted me. Still have the issue and sent 2 more emails. Still no response. I travel for work which is the sole purpose of purchasing this system and it's useless.

I have a DVR 1080P WD Wired Security System with 10 cams. The app is a poor design. You can't control video play back. You have to play from start to end no jumping to middle of video. so if your continuous recording good luck. Poor interface for pulling up calendar of recorded video. Unable to remotely configure DVR. No remote control of PTZ cams. Tech support unwilling to say what features are being developed/improved for the app and when releases are scheduled. I'm disappointed with app.

title: Night ‚Äì Blue Light Filter, Night Mode and Eye Care
description:
What is The Blue Light?

The human eye can sense electromagnetic waves between 380-780 nm. The blue light is composed of the components between 380-500 nm and has the highest energy of light that we can see. It is also produced by non-natural light sources (electronic devices) other than the Sun.

Damages of The Blue Light

As a result of scientific studies committed, long-term exposure to blue light has been found to damage tissues in the retina layer. At the same time, it was found that it also inhibited the secretion late of the melatonin hormone which affects the circadian rhythms including the sleep cycle. It also increases the risk of diseases such as Age Related Macular Degeneration(AMD).

Features
‚Ä¢ Reduces the blue light
‚Ä¢ Adjusts density of filter
‚Ä¢ Saves battery
‚Ä¢ Using easy and fast

title: Night Camera (Photo & Video)
description: Fast and Simple app for taking bright images and videos. comments: It works exactly as the developers described it; to "Allison," a Night Vision Camera," IS green-initially developed for Military & Law Enforcement: would you EXPECT them to use a Night Vision Camera visible to the enemy if used by Military Personnel In Country or better yet, a Law Enforcement Officer pursuing a criminal in your neighborhood? The night vision is just a green tint to the camera
Not bad! They do work well for nighttime but unfortunately the quality is terrible bc of the auto color fixing.

For those of you who complain about this not working in pitch black, you are ludacris. Of course it doesn't. Real night vision goggles cast infared waves onto objects and then they bounce back in to the sensor to create images of your surroundings. Your phone is built to detect infared waves, but not cast them. I think this app amplifies light sources to create brighter images. Also, (as it states in the description) the thermal filter is just an effect. Don't be so quick to judge.

title: One Night Ultimate Werewolf

This app automates the night time narration based on the roles in your game, and provides a timer that can be used for the day phase of the game.
descriptionHTML:
The One Night app is designed to be used with the One Night Ultimate Werewolf, One Night Ultimate Werewolf Daybreak, One Night Ultimate Vampire, One Night Ultimate Alien, and One Night Ultimate Super Villains party games published by Bezier Games. You will need at least one of these games in order to take advantage of this app.

This app automates the night time narration based on the roles in your game, and provides a timer that can be used for the day phase of the game.
summary: App for One Night Ultimate Werewolf, Daybreak, Vampire, Alien, & Super Villains
recentChanges: This version resolves an issue that prevented Narration audio from playing for some users who upgraded from older versions.
comments: I can't get the other character roles to appear. I only have 8 options when I should have over 15 and characters representing other versions of one night games. I've uninstalled and reinstalled the app 2 times since yesterday. I usually really love this game, but I couldn't play it last night with a big group.

The app shows under the navigation buttons. This makes it hard to hit the game buttons at the bottom of the screen. OnePlus 7t This can't be that hard. I created a Christmas version of the game with elves as the village and a Grinchs as the wolves using just Tasker and my voice recordings. Then I printed clipart of different elves at the local photo center, to use as the cards.

Have loved this app but a recent update has cause the play button to be unreachable. The developer has said that this is due to the oxygen OS used on OnePlus phones but that isn't an answer to a problem affecting their user base. Surely moving the buttons for all would be an effective solution...
I'd say this is an essential addition to the board game, especially so a player doesn't have to sit out just to moderate. Also, good level of customisability for what it is.

On my OnePlus 6 the buttons for start, settings and timer are half cut off the bottom of the screen and stuck behind the Android buttons (back, home recents). I can use the app if I make the Android button hideable but it is awkward to do so each time plus it still looks odd with half buttons.

title: Night Filter
description:
Night Filter is an easy to use screen filter application for your Android phone or tablet. Night Filter makes it easy for you to dim your screen, adjust your color tint, and more! Use it to read at night with less eye strain and correct for an excessive screen tint.

Features

‚òÖ Adjust your screen's brightness and color.
‚òÖ Add quick shortcuts to your home screen.
‚òÖ Schedule the filter to start & stop at a specific time.

And more! Download the app and try it out to see all of the features.

Troubleshooting

* If you accidentally turn your screen black, press volume up or volume down inside the app to turn off the filter, or power off your phone by holding the power button. 
* If "Override screen brightness" doesn't work, try turning off "auto brightness" from your settings. This feature may also cause your screen to turn off and/or the lockscreen to activate if the setting is too low.
* To install an app from Google Play or other app stores, please turn off the filter first.

If you have any questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to contact us by email. 

Permissions

Draw over other apps: Required for the screen filter to work.
Full network access, view network connections: Used for Google AdMob.

comments: It's a good app, I used it when I had the Samsung Galaxy J7, and it worked perfectly. However, I switched to the Samsung Galaxy S9 and now it doesn't work as well. It doesn't filter the pull down window (whatever you call it), and when you have the phone in rotation, the bar at the bottom with the home button, back, and tabs isnt filtered, so it just hurts your eyes unless you cover that portion of the screen with your hand or something. Can something be done about it?

it's a great app but there is a flaw, when you are on the internet surfing and you run across the website that is asking for your location and they give you a choice to block or allow well, the only way you can touch the screen to get results by your choices is by turning off the filter to choose and make your choice because, there is something in the filter that prohibits the connection between finger and the screen when making those choices from other websites.
Very glitchy. Definitely needs more work. I'm having a bunch of apps force close and pause whenever its being used. That's a shame because I really liked the app and the cute widget.
yes, i've finally found my own taste. This is wonderful, simple and easy with a lot of options. Looking for Night screen light filter? this is the Real solution.
Best app for changing screen color, I always keep it real dark and that SAVES LOTS of battery dude, used my phone for a whole day and it was barley at 70% at the end of the day. Love it.

title: Night Shift - Bluelight Filter for Good Sleep
description:
Blue light from the phone is a cause of eye fatigue. It disturbs your sleep and harms your eye health. The night shift function has been scientifically proven to reduce blue light. By adjusting the screen to soft light, it relieves eye fatigue, helps you sleep well and improves your vision health. 100% FREE and effective for eye care!

Features

‚àö Night filter shifts your screen to natural warm light
‚àö Help you gain one more hour of sleep
‚àö Protect your eyes for 24 hours with the auto-timer
‚àö Help maintain¬†healthy eye habits
‚àö Save your battery by 15%
‚àö Get better sleep by reducing blue light
‚àö Ease eye fatigue with just one tap
‚àö Many colors to choose from

WHAT IS BLUE LIGHT?
Blue light is the visible light spectrum (380-550nm) for circadian regulation. It contains more energy than other visible light types, so it may damage your retinal cells.

WHY SHOULD I USE BLUE LIGHT FILTER?
Research shows that exposure to blue light imposes serious threats to retinal neurons, causes eye strain, dry eyes, and inhibits the secretion of melatonin, a hormone that influences circadian rhythms. With our night shift function, your vision health will be greatly improved.

CAN BLUE LIGHT FILTER IMPROVE MY SLEEP?
Yes. Natural exposure to blue light during the daylight hours boosts people's energy, alertness and mood; however, it will disturb your sleep at night.(from wiki) Blue light filter can effectively reduce blue light from the screen and help you get better sleep.

RELEVANT SCIENTIFIC STUDIES¬†
1. Steven W. Lockley,¬†George C. Brainard,¬†Charles A. Czeisler. ‚ÄúHigh Sensitivity of the Human Circadian Melatonin Rhythm to Resetting by Short Wavelength Light‚Äù. J Clin Endocrinol Metab. 2003 Sep;88(9):4502-5.

2. Burkhart K, Phelps JR. ‚ÄúAMBER LENSES TO BLOCK BLUE LIGHT AND IMPROVE SLEEP: A RANDOMIZED TRIAL‚Äù. Chronobiol Int. 2009 Dec;26(8):1602-12.

3. ----‚ÄúEffects of blue lights technology‚Äù.              https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Effects_of_blue_lights_technology 

4. ‚ÄúHow¬†exposure¬†to¬†blue¬†light¬†affects¬†your¬†brain¬†and¬†body‚Äù. Nature Neuroscience; Harvard Health Publications; ACS, Sleep Med Rev, American Macular Degeneration Foundation; European Society of Cataract and Refractive Surgeons; JAMA Neurology

comments: I was reading and all of the sudden It shuts off with no warning and i was blinded with a bright light. I thought I did something wrong so I tried again and the same thing happened. Uninstalled.

I spend alot of hours reading on my tablet. Late into the nite & early morning. Recently my brother explained about blue light. Since he installed your app on my old tablet + the one I just purchased.. my eyes aren't as tired, painful or as worn thanks 2 this app.

BEWARE ALL NIGHT MODE / COLOR CHANGING APPS CAUSE PROBLEMS WITH ALLOWING NEW APPS TO ACCESS PERMISSIONS, SO IF THAT HAPPENS YOU JUST NEED TO BRIEFLY UN-INSTALL THIS APP, ALLOW THE NEW APP AND THEN RE-INSTALL THIS APP..... it's not just this app, it's all of these types of apps. I spent a very long time testing many. Even asking Google about the permissions issue says the same thing, so i just remove and put it back app bcoz its the easiest way & this is the best, nicest and basic one of all imo.
I wanted to like it but i couldn't see anyway to get rid of the ads even via payment... Weird.
I loved this app its perfect for me because im addicted to watching on here the night before my early shifts so after use I sleep like a baby

title: Night Owl HD
description:
Description
Night Owl HD gives you piece of mind no matter where you are! With the ability to view your Night Owl security system in real-time, you‚Äôll be able to monitor your home or business anytime, anywhere‚Äîall from the convenience of your mobile device.
 
Night Owl HD features:
 
‚Ä¢	Quick and easy mobile setup with Owl Scan‚Ñ¢
‚Ä¢	Live video and audio from your DVR security system on WiFi or 3G/4G LTE networks
‚Ä¢	Easily configure push notifications individually for each channel from your Smart Device
‚Ä¢	Customize channel names without having to access the DVR manually 
‚Ä¢	Save images directly to your smart device and share via text, email or social media
‚Ä¢	Now share important MP4 formatted videos via email or social media
‚Ä¢	Enhanced stability for better App connectivity and push notification retrieval
‚Ä¢	Multi-channel live feeds (4/8/16/32 channels)
‚Ä¢	Video playback of ANY recorded video stored on your DVR
‚Ä¢	Multiple DVR system log-on (up to 100 devices)
‚Ä¢	Create custom views and save as favorites (iPad only)

 
We are a security company and we take YOUR security seriously. All streaming video is direct from your local DVR to your mobile device with no 3rd party buffers in between, including us. Additionally, our app gives you full control of:
 
- EasyPan, Tilt, Zoom (PTZ) device control
- On-demand recording and still image/video captures
- Zoom, pan, playback, etc. abilities using standard swipe gestures
 
Visit us at www.NightOwlSP.com for more information on all of our products and services!
 
Night Owl HD is ONLY compatible with the following Night Owl security systems:

‚Ä¢	H5 NVR Series
‚Ä¢	HDA Series
‚Ä¢	AHD10 Series
‚Ä¢	AHD7 Series
‚Ä¢	NVR10 Series
‚Ä¢	F9 Series
‚Ä¢	F6 Series
               
WARNING: This application uses data to connect your DVR security system to your mobile device. When connected to a 3G or 4G LTE network, the live video feed from your DVR will be considered streaming data by your phone service provider and will contribute to any data or download limit your phone data plan may have. If you exceed your data plan limit, this may result in additional usage charges. It is highly recommended to contact your phone service provider to know the limits of your data plan before using this video streaming application.

recentChanges: Our first update of the Fall has arrived! The Night Owl engineers have been living on coffee and fast food so they can eliminate a bug affecting push notifications. Just like you, we do not like bugs! Where ever you may be, please stand and give these guys an ovation. The issue has been fixed. Remember to have your camera working as Halloween is right around the corner. Who will be watching your home when you are out hoarding candy? Secure. Protect. Connect.
comments: Good app but Please be careful. If you forget to close it, even if your phone screen locks, the data stream will continue. Got dinged for several GB several times. Even stopping background data for the app still allows steaming even when your screen locks. Now, I constantly force stop the app just to be sure. Edit : Mar 17 '19 Used it for 30 seconds, then closed it. 3 hours later received notification it used 5 gigs. Forced close the app, it continued background data. Not good.

All i get is connect failed when trying to log onto the app after the update. So when is there going to be a new update because since the last update in 2018 i cannot view my cameras on the app. I have cleared the app cache and checked on the application permissions within the mobile device settings, ensured that all permissions are enabled. Also, contacted your support, which still was no help. Cameras still do not work. Seems like a waste a money when it was working just fine before the update.

Live monitoring of video is generally ok, but...Video aspect ratios vary greatly in relation to the aspect ratio of the phone display. Need a user control to compensate for showing videos correctly on devices that are not a standard 16:9. Most newer phones are narrow but long, and the video gets stretched unnaturally. Also Push notifications don't seem to be working at all.

Ive had these cameras for almost a year now systems great to have the app sucks. ive upgraded my Internet speeds. I reset my phone daily. I even have the system hardwired to my internet and reset the night owl device weekly. But almost everyday i cant connect do to the app. App has had no update in well over a year. And this is very frustrating. And before night owl says give us a call so we can help. I have Just need to make better app

Updated my app, now I have to resell my whole camera setup, worked fine until update, now cannot get alerts. (The whole purpose of purchasing) Was going to purchase another nightowl 8 camera setup this week. Now I have to start the search for a decent surveillance company setup again. Not impressed, dont purchase this product, if you have sell it fast before others figure out it doesn't work anymore. Waste of money & your time

title: Goosebumps Night of Scares
description:
Featuring Jack Black as the Voice of R.L. Stine

***GOOSEBUMPS‚Äô GREATEST MONSTERS COME TO STORYPLAY! WILL YOU SURVIVE?***

The bestselling horror series comes to Storyplay on mobile and virtual reality for the first time and features Goosebumps most frightening monsters,  including Slappy the Dummy, evil gnomes, werewolves, and more.  Can you survive a night in R.L. Stine‚Äôs house - a living trap filled with his most famous monsters? Mystery, madness, and frightening moments await you in Storyplay!

****HIGHLIGHTS****

The first-ever Goosebumps game for Smart Phones and Tablets.

Goosebumps‚Äô greatest monsters come to Storyplay, including Slappy the Dummy, evil gnomes, werewolves, and more.

Jump scares galore!  Play a terrifying survival game of hide-n-seek with Goosebumps‚Äô most feared villains.

Hide to survive! Learn the secrets of R.L. Stine‚Äôs mysterious house to avoid being detected.

Solve the mysteries! Collect pages from R.L. Stine‚Äôs most famous books to trap monsters.
 
Virtual Reality mode: Place your phone in a VR-compatible headset to get even closer to the action! Compatible with any Smart Phone-compatible VR headset.

Stop Slappy from unleashing havoc, but beware of the TWIST that may lead to your doom. 

*** READ THE BOOKS. SEE THE MOVIE. PLAY THE GAME!***

title: Thermal Night Vision Color Filter Effect Camera
description: Night Vision Thermal Color Filter Effect is a App turning your Camera Vision with Thermal Colors. Changing bright pixels up the color line into yellow and red ones and darker pixels in lilac and blue, Night Vision Thermal Color Filter Effect turns your view in a heat and cold detector simulation. Use the Night Vision Goggles Button to activate the Thermal Effect Filter. Go through the instructions and press the flashlight button, if you want to use the bright flashlight in addition. Use this Night Vision Thermal Filter if you want to turn into a Color View or use the flashlight and watch through Camera if you walk by night to not stumble about anything on the ground now!

comments: It's an interesting app. But to call it Thermal Night Vision is misleading. That name implies it reads and colors images by heat. This is not at all true. The app reads and colors an image based on light. Looking at my 52" TV show a 4" space around the screen as hot. The center of the screen was cold. But the video I was watching was reduced in size and very dark. Same thing with an image of my grandson. One side of his face was lit up, but was from the light across the room.

This app is unacceptable. It didn't concure with it's described very detailed description of All it's said tools and upgrades. It screams at me when I touch the buttons and it doesn't show night vision mode it just keeps screaming. Now I am haunted with this horriffic screams in the night mares I now have. Please look into this for a kid would suffer even more tradgic visions. I'm sure. Lucky I'm a gatherer and that means strong minded. But still can y'all please help me or give me a pass

I need to use it more to give a more informed opinion. I like the ease of switching to thermal. It is a very clear image. Better than alot I have tried. I rated at 3 only because it was downloaded less than 10 minutes ago. I kept my experience down the middle due to this fact. I will welcome the opportunity to grade this application again after I familiarize my self to the abiliyies of performance, or any detriments thereof. Sincerely, Ms. Jolene Rae Fellows
The only bad part is that it turns your flashlight on even though it says night vision other than that its a good app to screw around with.

Night vision camera..... that does not work at night. It is pathetic. You have to use your torch for it to work and is just rubbish to use. 2 stars because it is REALLY fun to play with. That is my only positive comment. Other than that it is rubbish. Please don't get it because it just uses up your battery and doesn't work.

title: Night Mode Camera (Photo and Video)
description: Fast and Simple app for taking bright images and videos. While your photo flesh is unable to light the exotic beauty of nature, or moon and stars high in the skies, or beautiful sea waves, or flowers at night:  Night Mode Camera is ready to do that at the lowest luminosity without any additional appliances. With low light support during the photo/video recording, you can dynamically change camera sensitivity to achieve the best result as well as set any 1-8x zoom simultaneous to the recording due to the professional development. title: Night Light
description:
A night light app for Android phones with a variety of useful functions. Design your personal night-light according to your wishes.
The app is easy to use and reliable. You can freely configure the function as you wish.

Features:
‚Ä¢ Select the desired brightness as it suits you.
‚Ä¢ Determine how long the night light should shine at night.
‚Ä¢ If you wish, the app will automatically stop completely when the selected time has elapsed and the night light mode is terminated.
‚Ä¢ Add your desired background image. Either from your device's memory or from a set of supplied images.
‚Ä¢ If you don't want to have a background image, you can of course simply start a night light without an image.
‚Ä¢ You can freely choose the background color of the light.
‚Ä¢  The app can automatically mute your phone when you start the night light. If the night light is switched off, the previous status is automatically restored.
‚Ä¢ We have supplied 3 standard configurations for you.
‚Ä¢ Of course, you can add as many configurations as you like.
‚Ä¢ And of course you can delete the configurations.

Languages:
‚Ä¢ English
‚Ä¢ German
‚Ä¢ Spanish (coming soon)

The app will be developed continuously, therefore there will be new functions from time to time in the future. 

Coming Soon
‚Ä¢ It will be possible to play soothing background noises such as ocean noise.
‚Ä¢ We are working on a fall asleep function, some time after activating the night light the light slowly gets darker when it is quiet in the room. 
‚Ä¢ If the mobile phone in the room notices an increase in volume (as when waking up), the light will automatically become brighter again.
‚Ä¢ Soon it will be possible to use the night light as an alarm clock.
‚Ä¢ We will equip the app with a warning function, if the battery level is critical and no charging cable is connected, then a warning window will be displayed.

Have a lot of fun with this app and if you have suggestions for improvement, don't hesitate to contact us.
descriptionHTML:
A night light app for Android phones with a variety of useful functions. Design your personal night-light according to your wishes.
The app is easy to use and reliable. You can freely configure the function as you wish.

Features:
‚Ä¢ Select the desired brightness as it suits you.
‚Ä¢ Determine how long the night light should shine at night.
‚Ä¢ If you wish, the app will automatically stop completely when the selected time has elapsed and the night light mode is terminated.
‚Ä¢ Add your desired background image. Either from your device's memory or from a set of supplied images.
‚Ä¢ If you don't want to have a background image, you can of course simply start a night light without an image.
‚Ä¢ You can freely choose the background color of the light.
‚Ä¢ The app can automatically mute your phone when you start the night light. If the night light is switched off, the previous status is automatically restored.
‚Ä¢ We have supplied 3 standard configurations for you.
‚Ä¢ Of course, you can add as many configurations as you like.
‚Ä¢ And of course you can delete the configurations.

Languages:
‚Ä¢ English
‚Ä¢ German
‚Ä¢ Spanish (coming soon)

The app will be developed continuously, therefore there will be new functions from time to time in the future.

Coming Soon
‚Ä¢ It will be possible to play soothing background noises such as ocean noise.
‚Ä¢ We are working on a fall asleep function, some time after activating the night light the light slowly gets darker when it is quiet in the room.
‚Ä¢ If the mobile phone in the room notices an increase in volume (as when waking up), the light will automatically become brighter again.
‚Ä¢ Soon it will be possible to use the night light as an alarm clock.
‚Ä¢ We will equip the app with a warning function, if the battery level is critical and no charging cable is connected, then a warning window will be displayed.

Have a lot of fun with this app and if you have suggestions for improvement, don't hesitate to contact us.
summary: Easy to use night light app with freely selectable background and much more.
recentChanges: Fixed Bugs
comments: Used this while travelling for the kids but also to see where we go in the night if we have to be up. It's lovely to adjust brightness, the kids love the moon on as they go to sleep.
Moon light setting provides perfect balance of keeping room dim enough to be relaxing and not disruptive to sleep but with enough light to check on baby in the Moses basket and move safely about.
it's rudimental, needs better UI but gets the job done. some people say it doesnt work in certain versions of android, im currently using Android 9 with MIUI 10 and works fine.
Very nice . You can even choose an image you want as the light üòä 10/10

title: Asylum Night Shift - Five Nights Survival
description:
FULL GAME NOW FREE!
Can you survive five nights at the asylum?

Welcome to your new job as nightwatchman at the Ravenhurst Mental Asylum. From your security office you must keep watch on the asylum patients throughout the night - and make sure that they don't enter your room! Can you survive five nights of terror at the asylum!

'Asylum Night Shift - Five Nights Survival' brings a whole new depth of gameplay to the five nights survival game - including:

* An interactive map console where you can open and close doors around the asylum. Use the doors to prevent the patients reaching you!
* Patient tracker devices which allow you to monitor the patients movements on your map console.
* Security cameras where you can watch the patients walking around the asylum.
* A warning alarm in your office which will alert you when a patient is approaching.
* A faulty office security door... use it wisely, and only when you really need to!

Survive all fives nights at the asylum to unlock the bonus endless sixth night!


Protect yourself from these four terrifying asylum patients:

Mr Giggles:
This psychotic clown was once a favourite children's party entertainer... until the kids started going missing that is!

Little Alice:
She used to a be a normal fun-loving 10 year old girl... but not anymore!

Buzzsaw Barry:
He's a regular here - and he's back to his old lunatic ways. Quite why the doctors thought it was a good idea to let him keep his chainsaw nobody knows!

Faceless Man:
The newest patient at the asylum. This guy has been frightening people for years - and he doesn't intend to stop now!

----------------------------------

PHONE REQUIREMENTS:
It is recommended that this game is played on a newer phone with at least 512mb of RAM. The game will crash on older devices.

----------------------------------

title: Night Shift: Blue Light Filter
description:
**Updated - Modify timings of filter, Auto ON/OFF, exempt filter from running on certain apps**

Do you use your mobile phone after sunset? Do you use your phone within 3 hours of your bed time? If yeas, then your device might be taking your sleep away. Bluelight from your mobile screens sends a signal to brain to wake up, and makes it difficult for us to sleep at night. So if you have difficulty sleeping (insomina), the mobile might be the culprit. 

The solution? This simple screen filter or as we call it, a Blue Light Filter. 

This blue light filter controls the amount of blue light emitted from your phone, and thus it reduces the harmful effects of using mobile phone at night. 

This is the simplest Blue Light Filter App and it lets you: 

- Set separate filter intensity for day & night time
- Turn filter ON/ OFF through a single tap on notification bar 
- No annoying notifications
- No Ads
- No permissions required for Bluelight Filter app to run


Best option is not to use your mobile devices after sunset, but if you must then this Bluelight Filter app is there to save your eyes! Say goodbye to blue.

This lux controlling app is must for eyecare. Night Shift app for android.

Useful if you are searching for: 
- Blue
- Bluelight
- Filter
- Bluelight Filter App
- Blue light filter App
- Night Mode App
- Night Shift for Android

title: Mystic Night Live Wallpaper
description:
Mystic Night Live Wallpaper brings you the magical atmosphere of peace and mystery. These HD images of the cloudy sky, starry night, descending mist and full moon will leave you breathless. Go on a night tour of places that live a life of their own. Take a break and enjoy the breathtaking night scene with these mystical images. Decorate your smartphone screen with wonderful hd night pictures and enjoy moonlight and tranquil night scene. 

- Motion of flashes and lights keeps changing with time.
- You can choose from several different Mystic Night background themes.
- Optimized Battery Usage
- Compatible with 99% mobile phone devices.
- The wallpaper app will sleep when your phone is inactive, so this live wallpaper will not drain your battery.

This free new Live Wallpaper will make you feel the magic of moonlight and the cloudy night sky, mysterious and enchanting at the same time. You will be blown away by this amazing images of the night sky, shinning moon, calm water, moonlight and mesmerizing mist slowly flowing over your screen. Mystic Night Live Wallpaper is taking you to a night tour through beautiful city streets, along the sea shore while the moon shines mysteriously. All you need to do is download it right now for a unique mystical night experience!

title: HALO ‚Äì Bluelight Filter, Night Mode, Anti-Glare
description:
Introducing HALO!
With HALO you can block the blue light and adjust brightness of the screen in dark places so that you can keep your eyes healthy and have a good night‚Äôs sleep.

You will find HALO useful when
- to block the harmful blue light emitted by device screens
- to dim the brightness that interferes with your sleep
- the built-in blue light filter in OS is not enough.

HALO has these features
- Night mode(the blue light filer) ON/OFF
- Adjust intensity and brightness
- Quick setting in the notification area
- Night mode ON/OFF in the top bar(Quick Settings Tile) (for Android Nougat 7.0+)
- Schedule Night Mode
- Activate/Deactivate the app (stop background service)
 
HALO also has this awesome feature!
- Set a custom schedule for night mode. "Apply this function when using your personal device while lying down on bed" It enables night mode at scheduled time only if you use your device lying down on.

* Execution Condition: it shifts to night mode only when the device is turned upside down (180Àö), right side (90Àö) or left side (270Àö). It will not run night mode if you are walking around outside at that time.
 
Permissions details
- Receive data from the internet: used for in-app purchase and serving ads
- View network connections: used for in-app purchase and serving ads
- Full network access: used for in-app purchase and serving ads
- Run at startup: used to run HALO automatically when the device restarts
- Draw over other apps: required to overlay blue light filter
- Prevent the device from sleeping: required to run night mode at the scheduled time

Please refer to the information below
- HALO use a foreground service (the background service which must display a notification), so it would not be terminated by the system during use.
- Please do not worry about things that affect user experience. HALO does not drain battery. It doesn‚Äôt do unnecessary action either.
- The four filter colors that can be set currently are different from the actual filter colors. Actually, blue color is removed and reddish color is used to effectively block the blue light that is harmful to the eyes.

Permissions details
This app is free including ads!
Please purchase the pro version to remove ads and for more features.
If you enjoy using the app, please rate it 5 stars. Thank you for your support!

comments: As someone who stuffers from horrible chronic migraines that are extremely light sensitive this app has been a life saver. Most apps that are blue light filters have pop up ads across and just aren't as useful. This app is also so aesthetically pleasing, which of course isn't necessary but very nice. The most useful apps for me because i cared my eye so much ... This app works well and so far theres no problem with this app and definetly recommended .

The free version is great! It can be hard to see and turn it off in daylight, but it works really well at night. HOWEVER (devs pls note!) I wouldn't purchase premium. I usually leave it on the setting it has, so it's not a big deal if I can't change brightness or color from the notification page. Trying to is quite annoying. The notification buttons aren't very responsive, and they use increments of 1. Please increase to at least 5, or bring up sliding bars with the color options when tapped.
Very cool app, blue light filter with several different colors. Would recommend to anyone, save your eyes.

title: Night Screen
description:
„ÄåNight Screen„Äçis a Material Design Application which can protect your eyes from being hurt by screen, creating a mask at the top of screen in order to make screen darker. We can solve the problem that the lowest brightness is not low enough in some devices.
(PS: Even though you are using our application to make screen darker, you should reduce the time watching screen in a dark environment.)

( Enable permission in Android 6.0: "Settings" app - "Apps" - The gear icon - "Draw over other apps" - "Night Screen" - Then enable it )

Otherwise, this application is open source under GNU GPL v3 License.
Github Repo: https://github.com/fython/Blackbulb

- Update UI
- Add more options

Welcome to discuss & feedback in our telegram group~ (You can find link in more settings)
comments: Love the sleek UI and icons. Unfortunately, it's a bit tedious to have to use a home screen shortcut to toggle it or open up the app to modify the amount of dimming. The auto mode has never worked for me. The biggest let down for me, however, is that it does not affect the notification shade or lock screen.

Great app, except it doesn't have an off switch. You have to open apps, find the program, and manually force stop it to turn it off. That's a bit obnoxious. Otherwise, it does exactly as I need and gets my screen nice and dark.
Awesome app, thank you for your work. Perhaps add an intent for on and off instead of just one for toggle. This would make it easier to integrate into tasker and other uses.
Great app. Works a charm. Only thing is I can't quit the app unless I go into app settings and force stop it.

If the app's automatic timer mode worked, it would be perfect. The interface is great and simple, and looks perfect with any UI version. Unfortunately on Oreo, even with battery optimaztions disabled, it still doesn't enable or disable automatically.

title: Weather Night Dock Free
description:
Weather Night Dock is an application for dock stations, showing information about the current time, battery level and next alarm, but also about the weather* beautiful, easily readable form.
Can be used as a "night clock". The screen brightness can be set manually or automatically by a light sensor.
Can be used as Daydream for Android 4.2+ smartphones, tablets, TV (and boxes).
Has a variety of settings:
- Auto start/close program when connecting/disconnecting the charger, even if the device is locked.
- Customizable time format and temperature display (12/24 hour, Celsius/Fahrenheit)
- Quick setting of alarms by double-tap on information about the nearest alarm clock
- A variety of personalization settings:
- Theme background
- Clock fonts
- Color elements

Internet usage opitimized so that it can be used in GPRS and EDGE (2G) networks with minimum traffic consumption.

From version 1.4 - multilingual support of weather conditions: English, Russian, Italian, Spanish, Ukrainian, German, Portuguese, Romanian, Polish, Finnish, Dutch, French, Bulgarian, Swedish, Chinese, Turkish, Croatian, Catalan.
From version 1.5 - added information about missed calls and sms on main screen
From version 1.8 - animated weather icons
From version 1.9 - Daydream feature for Android 4.2+ devices
From version 1.10 - setting a background image from gallery
From version 1.11 - added information about missed Viber and WhatsApp on main screen for Android 4.3+ devices (need your permission to access notifications)
From version 1.12 - BIG CLOCK Tablet mode
From version 1.13 - GPS for locations
From version 1.14 - German, French, Italian translations
From version 1.15 - Seconds in digital clock
From version 1.16 - Manual weather data update
From version 1.17 - No need to obtain personal key

comments: Works fantastic as a night stand clock app, love the autodimming feature. Love that it turns off the Android Navigation buttons and white bar. Switches off reliably when removing from wireless charge stand, but no longer will turn on automatically :( Have to manually turn on each night. Not a deal breaker though. Samsung Note 10+ running Android 10 Though now I am getting the Rate Me nag screen, even though I have already rated it???

Setting screen brightness to minimum actually turns off device's backlight and with completely black screen its impossible to use the device any further of course... need to reboot. But this app will remember this idiotic setting, so when you try to use it again your screen will go blank again, yeah :( If you got into this problem: go to settings > apps > find this app and clear its cache, reboot, and set it up again - just dont set brightness to minimum
Useful app but SEVERELY LIMITED IN OPTIONS, CAN NOT CHANGE FONT SIZE,... *****$2 FOR PRO IS A RIPOFF*******!!!!!***INSTEAD OF LISTENING TO REVIEWS DEVELOPER IGNORES THEM AND JUST REGURITATES SPAM
Samsung Note- android 10-Wireless charger : App runs great, when I rest phone on wireless cradle it automatically starts and displays this app. Makes a great nightstand clock beside my bed.
NO AM/PM indicator, app crashes when you select big clock mode. NO SUPPORT OR RESPONSE FROM DEVELOPER. $2 TO UPGRADE FOR PRO IS *****ROBBERY*******

title: Night Restaurant

From now on, you are the boss of the Night Restaurant! Run your own restaurant,cook a variety of tasty dishes, welcome the lovely customers, listen to each customer's distinct story, earn the gold coin, protect the environment, get satisfaction, unlock new dishes and buildings, step by step to expand the business empire owned by you...

comments: I love your app, it is so addicting. However, as much as i love it, that annoying ad is ruining the game, "Miner To Rich - Idle Tycoon Simulator." It is not playing, it didn't provide the reason why i watch the ad, after i play it, i can't play any other ad anymore, and lastly, I CAN'T REPORT THIS AD. Will you please fix this ad as soon as possible. Thank you.

Dear developer, 1. Please change or remove the sound of the car horn, its getting annoying after playing a while. 2. Please add an option to remove the speech bubble, its doesnt have any function other than disrupt the gameplay. 3. Please change the number from the income and the price of the upgrade. Its confusing.

It's cute and addicting. However, I always get stuck at a certain action due to ads, which most of the time, doesn't work at all . For example, theres a certain character visiting you and either choices doesn't work so you have to exit the app for it to disappear. There's also a requirement on some furniture and receipts that you have to watch at least one ad to unlock, but then again, ads don't pop up no matter how hard you try. The game's a pretty good time killer tho. Kudos to that!

Good game but too many bugs like when trying to watch ads but it isn't working, whenever i try to click watch ads or watch tv it doesn't work unless you exit the game and relogin again. After watching one ad or two ads bug comes up again and watching ads stops working over and over again. Please fix that bug asap. Overall it's a cute and relaxing game that everyone might love except if you won't fix those bugs we might actually stop playing it.

It's a cute and addictive game, I enjoy the visuals and the soothing background music. It has a fairly easy gameplay and not time consuming for an idle game. My only problem is that everytime I press on Santa or try to collect a lot of money on the table, my screen would be all glitchy and would swipe to either side of the page by itself. Could you please fix this problem so that it wouldn't be so sensitive and move to the other screen by itself? Once you do I would edit my experience, thanks!

title: Night Mode Enabler
description:
Want access to the Night Mode Quick Tile on Nougat? Seems like it's hidden. But with this amazing app, you can get a sweet VIP pass to that awesome blue-light killer.

If you're having trouble - make sure to click "On" in the top left rather than the switch in the top right once it opens System UI Tuner.

Note: On Android 7.1 and higher - this feature is officially built into the operating system, called Night Light. However, this feature requires a driver, and as a result, only is available on Pixel and Pixel XL (and newer devices). As a result this will not work on Nexus devices on that version.

title: Night Vision Cam
description:
a night vision camera.

turn your android device into a color night vision device with picture and video camera and zoom.

-real time display
-control brightness
-control gain
-control zoom
-control shuttertime
-supports multi-threading
-supports 4 color modes (green,red,blue and full color)
-auto take picture interval timer
-record video
-auto gain
-VR Mode (use with google cardboard , open dive or other Virtual Reality glasses)

hold your device very steady.
fast device recommended.ad-supported.
with most devices you can also use an ir-illuminator to see at complete darkness or use nightvisioncam to test your ir remote controls.

please mail problems, errors or questions, i cannot answer to comments.
videos and pics will be saved into folder "NightVisionCam" on your Memory Card.
to select video mode, press menu button and select mode.

Thank you i used this little app when we got evacuated from our house in a bush fire , i dont like the darkness ,but i somehow found this and it helped me calm down and go to sleep

please never change this melody. I love this so much. I love the song but cant figure out which one it is. i love it!

title: Day and night clock
description:
NightDream 

... a desk clock that is also suitable for the night. In dock mode this app provides a simple digital clock that automatically adjusts its brightness, During the day the display is bright, but in the night it dims to a minimum brightness. Simply adjust the font size using a two-finger-zoom gesture.

Daydream
This app can be used as a Daydream from Android 4.2 on.

Quick alarms
Using a swipe from the left, you can set the alarm clock. Delete it by tapping on the lower right corner. 

Battery 

While charging your mobile device an estimate time is calculated until the battery is full.

Notifications
You can enable notifications for missed phone calls, GMail, WhatsApp and twitter. On Android 4.3+ go to Settings > Security > Notification access > enable NightDream.

 In earlier versions of Android go to Settings > Accessibility > enable NightDream.

In-App Payments

The current weather conditions can be shown below the time.  This feature purchased within the app

The project is open source. If you want to send a donation you can do this via in-app purchase.

Permissions

android.permission.MODIFY_AUDIO_SETTINGS
This permissions allows to siilence the device during the night mode. 

android.permission.RECORD_AUDIO
During the night mode the screen may be deactivated. It can be switched on again if a certain ambient noise level is reached. Therefore the app continuously records audio. The app does not store audio data.

android.permission.WAKE_LOCK
The app is allowed to wake the device from sleep in order to enable the screen and to keep the screen on. 

android.permission.READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE
The permission is necessary to read background images from the external storage.

Screen Lock

This app uses the Device Administrator permission. The permission is exclusively used to lock the screen while the app is running. Before uninstalling the app the permission must be revoked.

comments: This is a really useful app, I use it every night. I just wish that the settings you can use to change the colour of the 'text' actually changed the colour of the text of the clock and date display. Instead it only changes the colour of the pop up control icons which appear at the side when you tap the screen and which then disappear after use and leave white clock digits. It would merit 5 stars if that bit worked as you would expect.

I have used this for a while. I did use another of these programs but it got bloated and became cumbersome to use. This one works straight away. Simple to set alarms. Why take an alarm clock when you can have this. It automatically starts up when you plug in the charger. I recommend this.
Love the clock, it has tons of settings. Only thing I can't seem to find is a way to make it bigger because it really only occupies like 1/2 of my screen size

It does everything is says in the paid Full version. So far other then a few crashes with my Xiaomi Mi Mix 2S everything is working fine. My favorite is the Digital Clock with date/weather. I also like that I can stream music at night with a timer. Puts me to sleep!

I love this app. In fact, had a mini panic attack because I uninstalled it and couldn't find it again! So happy I found it and reinstalled. I have no complaints. It does exactly what I was looking for.

title: Night Clock
description:
This night clock is perfect for those, who wake up at night and would like to know how much more can they sleep.
Features: digital clock, date, battery and more, which are can be set, as the size and the color of the clock. Saving mode is available too in night clock settings, which means that if you swicht it on, the items will be hidden after 10 seconds. comments: It works well enough as a night clock, but I feel a few improvements could be made. I'd love an option for it to automatically launch at a certain time each night, and for it to close in the morning with a double tap or a long press on the screen or something like that.
The app itself works well enough but the settings screen is awful. The over-use of popup dialogs makes it inconsistent and unintuitive, fortunately once set you don't have to revisit it often.
Great clock app! It's the most like a real alarm clock than anything else. Offers a very dim setting and stays on all night. Exactly what I was looking for. Highly recommend this app.

Its called a night clock but it doesn't stay on... at least I couldn't figure out how to keep it on..... that's the only reason why I want a night clock to act like my alarm clock overnight. Every other feature was perfect but I roll over to look and see what time it was and it's off
I have two Galaxy S 10 + phones. On one I can adjust the colors and on the other I can't. Downloaded and set them up with same time. When trying to change colors the font actually changes ?????

title: Night Ambient Lights
description:
Turn off the big lights. Fill up the bath tube with warm to hot water and make sure you add enough soap to get the right amount of relaxing foam. You may want to pop in some bathing salts as well. Get a towel or cushion for your head. Get your smartphone and choose the right color set according to your mood. Put it aside safely, and voila! Let your mind expel all stress and worries out. That's the magic of Chromotherapy.

What is Chromotherapy? Chromotherapy, also called color therapy, is a natural technique widely used in alternative medicine. Its purpose is to relief the body of many diseases by using colors - each color having a different electromagnetic wavelenth and energy, to which our body reacts accordingly.

Colors can influence people‚Äôs emotions, making possible the creation of a state of mind which restores various imbalances to reach a healthy state. This app let's you choose a preconfigured color palette, or set your own colors so you can configure depending on your mood. It also helps reducing weariness and heaviness.

Chromotherapy practitioners advise to make sessions every day. They claim regular practitioners will feel some positive effects after a few weeks.

As positive effects, you can achieve relaxing feeling, stress reduction and keep the energy balance. Every color has a specific effect for each part of the human body and state of consciousness.

The World Health Organization (WHO) recognizes chromotherapy as an alternative therapy, without risk or contraindications.

Features:
 - Unique ease of use: Just tap on the screen. The rest is self-explanatory.
 - It can be used like multicolor flashlight, torch and lamp
 - Several color modes with carefully crafted transitions:
   * Warm Colors
   * Cold Colors
   * Neon Colors
   * Random Colors
   * Fixed Color from the palette
 - Possibility to fix the color shown on screen at any time
 - Customize the transition times between colors to create your ideal combination
 - Shut down Timer: You can enjoy and relax before sleep without risk that it remains on all night long
 - Enjoy it as an original multicolor ambient light in every corner of your house
 - Use it in the bath, at night and even while partying! Perfect for the disco.
 - Great for colorful night selfies.


Your comments are welcome in order to improve the app. For technical issues please contact here: danlustudios@gmail.com

- Enjoy it as an original multicolor ambient light in every corner of your house
- Use it in the bath, at night and even while partying! Perfect for the disco.
- Great for colorful night selfies.


Your comments are welcome in order to improve the app. For technical issues please contact here: danlustudios@gmail.com

title: Night Mode - Blue Light Filter
description:
Faster falling asleep & relax
Night Mode app filters blue light that according to the latest research studies boosts alertness and may affect your natural sleep and wake cycles (circadian rythm). Additionally it precisely controls screen color temperature to setup the best light to calm down and relax.

Protect your eyes
When using your device at night or twilight, even minimum screen brightness may tire your eyes. Shift to Night Mode to turn on extra screen brightness reduction by dedicated dim filter as well as by main blue light filter.

Do not disturb others
If you sleep with other person or use your device in places where screen light may disturb others, this app is for you.

Read comfortable in bed
If you are night owl that uses your mobile in bed for browsing Internet or reading, this app can prevent turning off the screen as well as lock screen rotation to any orientation you like, even upside down.

Quick shift
Just shake your device to turn into Night Mode and back (this is additional feature to turn on in app's settings).
For Nougat users it's possible to add Quick Settings Tile to quickly shift to Night Mode.
Automatic scheduler can switch Night Mode by preferred time, for example turn on on twilight and off in the morning.

Save battery power
Night Mode lowers battery power consumption by reducing blue light and screen highlight.

Customization
Night Mode has many customization options like blue light filter color temperature, intensity, shaking sensitivity, notification visibility, pause duration, app theme and more.

Permissions
Draw over other apps ‚Äì required to overlay blue light filter.
Run at startup ‚Äì to allow scheduling and keep filter on/off state during device restarts.
Network access ‚Äì to allow bug reporting (optional) and showing ads (not many).

title: Nighty Night - Bedtime Story
description:
"Nighty Night!" is a lovely App for a daily go-to-sleep ritual with cute animals, sweet lullaby music and great narration. All around the house the lights go out, and in the barn even the animals are tired. But who puts them to bed? Who turns out the lights in their stalls? That is the task for small children aged 1-4. Watching all the animals go to sleep is a great way to set the mood for bedtime.

The interactive bedtime "Nighty Night" is brought to you by Oscar-Nominee Heidi Wittlinger (2002, best animated short) who put a lot of passion and effort in constructing little sets made of paper and combining them with 2D illustration and animation. 

Languages: English, German, Spanish, French, Italian, Dutch, Russian and Portuguese. 

-------------------

About Fox & Sheep:
We are a Studio in Berlin and develop high quality apps for kids at the age of 2-8 years. We are parents ourselves and work passionately and with a lot of commitment on our products. We work with the best illustrators and animators around the world to create and present the best apps possible ‚Äì to enrich the lives of our and your kids.

Enjoyed by young grandchild many times.

The lights are on in the animal's home until your toddler turns off the light and the animal goes to sleep. Soothing Grandpa-voiced narrator says goodnight to the animals and to the child who is still awake after all the animals are asleep. Extra animals are worth buying for a low price. Preferred to passive watching of videos
